name: simple-downloads-list_wordpress_plugin
description: === Simple Downloads List === Contributors: neofix Donate link: https://neofix.ch Tags: downloads-list, simple, downloads, table, files Requires at least: 6.1 Tested up to: 6.7 Requires PHP: 8.0 Stable tag: 1.4.3 License: MIT License URI: https://github.com/Neofix-IT/simple-downloads-list_wordpress_plugin/blob/main/LICENSE

scripts.copy:images: shx mkdir -p dist/images && shx cp -R assets/images dist/
scripts.copy:fontawesome: shx mkdir -p dist/fontawesome && shx cp -R assets/fontawesome/* dist/fontawesome/
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run copy:images && npm run copy:fontawesome && wp-scripts start
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy:images && npm run copy:fontawesome && wp-scripts build
